Hi again, I have just added a _Dummy_ local package by:
`(bin) pkg> add "C:\Users\Lysandros An\Documents\Julia\dev\Dummy"`
Now it appears in the global Project.toml as the other, standard packages.
I am able to say `using Dummy`, without error. However, I cannot run code, unless I first type `include("Dummy.jl")`
Why is that so?
